fi.towerdefencegamesinc.towerdefence.java.logic

Class GameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.towerdefencegamesinc.towerdefence.java.logic.GameMap

  • public class GameMap
extends Object
    The map is used to track objects in game and locations available for building.
    Author:
    vrsaari
